english.segment1: Peace be unto you. My peace I give to you. In this world you'll surely find. Trials of many different kinds, but
english.segment2: (Chorus). Be of good cheer. Be of good cheer. For I have overcome this world. Be of good cheer. Be of good cheer
english.segment3: For now I go away. But I will return. To take you to a place to dwell. So where I am you'll be as well
english.segment5: In this world you'll surely find. Trials of many different kinds. But I will not forsake you then. I'll be with you until the end
